name: iEscaper!2 -Escape from the Castle of Doom
name_original: iEscaper!2 -Escape from the Castle of Doom
description:
Your mission now begins in the mysterious Castle of Doom where you must find the
Ancient Crystal of Dragon. Guarding the crystal within the castle lies many mysterious secrets, deadly traps, and an ancient evil which will stop at nothing to protect the crystal.

See if you have what it takes to solve the many mysteries, avoid the traps, and obtain the Crystal of Dragon!

Overview
You are a lone Ninja whose mission it is to infiltrate the mysterious castle.
Search for clues, solve mysterious puzzles, Tap, Shake, and Swipe your way out of traps
in this thrilling epic adventure through the mysterious Castle of Doom!
